Summary: To make a long story less...
divs: Sighting DetailsI was viewing a pitch for a re-roof (via Google) and saw a dark disk in the background; I followed it frame by frame (to the best of my ability)but it disappeared from all view and the Van could not have driven hardly ten feet. I turned the viewer up to search the sky for that dark disk and there before my eyes, was the "Holy Grail" of Einstein's Theory - the bending of the fabric of our atmosphere, right before my eyes, with a beautiful disk just about to enter (so I presume) into one of two super-shafts of light bending our blue sky, like a whirlpool, with the Disk placed right there, at the shaft. More to come... Dedicated to all those who would bury their head in the sand...
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in O'Fallon
There were no other sightings in O'Fallon on or around June 1st 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
